channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MCHECKSTYLE-146] mvn checkstyle:checkstyle KO, Unable to find the mojo, org/apache/maven/doxia/logging/Log
item.project: Maven Checkstyle Plugin (Moved to GitHub Issues)
item.description:
Since checkstyle 2.6 was released on the maven respository, mvn checkstyle:checkstyle fails on few environments.

Here is the error I have :

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] Searching repository for plugin with prefix: 'checkstyle'.
[INFO] org.apache.maven.plugins: checking for updates from central
[WARNING] repository metadata for: 'org.apache.maven.plugins' could not be retrieved from repository: central due to an error: Error transferring file
[INFO] Repository 'central' will be blacklisted
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building CDN - Composant - Maven Dependency Matrix
[INFO]    task-segment: [checkstyle:checkstyle]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

item.summary: mvn checkstyle:checkstyle KO, Unable to find the mojo, org/apache/maven/doxia/logging/Log

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I see this in your logs 

[WARNING] repository metadata for: 'org.apache.maven.plugins' could not be retrieved from repository: central due to an error: Error transferring file
[INFO] Repository 'central' will be blacklisted

Then I can see you are using maven 2.0.9.
Do you have same issues with a more recent version.
BTW a standard is to add the plugin version in your pom if you don't want issues when a release is push to central

I also face this problem :

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building JAC
[INFO] task-segment: [site]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

This plugin is using Doxia 1.1.x. Unless we shade Doxia we will need to bump the prerequisite Maven version to one that uses Doxia 1.1+.
Fixed in r1238066 by updating the required Maven version to 2.2.1.

jira-importer commented on issue #475:
URL: https://github.com/apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin/issues/475#issuecomment-2969783535

**[Olivier Lamy](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=olamy)** commented

I see this in your logs

```
[WARNING] repository metadata for: 'org.apache.maven.plugins' could not be retrieved from repository: central due to an error: Error transferring file
[INFO] Repository 'central' will be blacklisted
```

Then I can see you are using maven 2.0.9.
Do you have same issues with a more recent version.
BTW a standard is to add the plugin version in your pom if you don't want issues when a release is push to central

jira-importer opened a new issue, #475:
URL: https://github.com/apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin/issues/475

**[Olivier Ribardière](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=ribardo0)** opened **MCHECKSTYLE-146(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MCHECKSTYLE-146?redirect=false)** and commented

Since checkstyle 2.6 was released on the maven respository, mvn checkstyle:checkstyle fails on few environments.

jira-importer commented on issue #475:
URL: https://github.com/apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin/issues/475#issuecomment-2969783556

**[Dennis Lundberg](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=dennisl@apache.org)** commented

Fixed in [r1238066](http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1238066) by updating the required Maven version to 2.2.1.

jira-importer commented on issue #475:
URL: https://github.com/apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin/issues/475#issuecomment-2969783551

**[Dennis Lundberg](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=dennisl@apache.org)** commented

This plugin is using Doxia 1.1.x. Unless we shade Doxia we will need to bump the prerequisite Maven version to one that uses Doxia 1.1+.
This project has moved from Jira to GitHub Issues. This issue was migrated to apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin#475.
